item.title: Meditation
item.description: In mindfulness meditation, we’re learning how to pay attention to the breath as it goes in and out, and notice when the mind wanders from this task. The idea behind mindfulness seems simple—the practice takes patience.

item.title: Story Structure
item.description: Dan Harmon walks us through Story Structure 101 thru 106.

item.title: Today I Learned
item.description: Today I Learned # Dyslexia # This website will try to show you how people with Dyslexia struggle everyday. Check it out. Gribble # Small marine isopod. Feeds on algae, driftwood, and submerged wood of docks and wharves. Up to 10mm in length. Gribbles have an organ called the hepatopancreas that extends almost the entire length of their bodies, where they make their own enzymes. Researchers hope to learn ways to improve the process of turning biomass into liquid fuels by studying gribbles.
